title: Accessibility problems
description: I need to first click on one of the 'live' areas before it starts working (e.g., the banner with the tool buttons, the nav frame, or the content frame.)
OB: When launching the Help view, the tab key does not have any effect.
EB: When launching the Help view, the tab key should navigate through the interactive elements.
SR:
1. Launch the Help view.
2. Press the tab key and observe that it does not navigate through the interactive elements.
